title: Enhancing Neutral Hydrogen Production by Disrupting the Rigid Hydrogen Bond Network on Ru Nanoclusters through Nb2O5-Mediated Water Reorientation
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01855A, Paper
Xiao Hui Chen, Xiaolin Li, Ting Li, Jia Huan Jia, Jinglei Lei, Nian Bing Li, Hong Qun Luo
The hydrogen evolution reaction (HER) under neutral conditions is highly important for achieving practical hydrogen production. However, catalysts often exhibit lower activity under neutral conditions, the cause of which remains...
